features: 1.[Long Handled And Extension Pole] You can choose the length of the broom according to the height of the child or adult.Makes you more comfortable and sweeps the floor without bending over
2.[2024 New Design] Built in scraper and comb can easily load garbage into the dustpan.And uniquely added dust cover/The hair of the broom is increased from three rows to four rows.

3.[Convenient storage & save space] Broom snaps into dustpan for upright,You can keep your house clean and tidy,save your space,The lid can cover the dustpan perfectly to prevent cockroaches get into the dustpan

4.[Good Quality] Broom and dustpan made from environmentally friendly recycled PET and new ABS material, Make this broom set life longer.The handle of this dustpan and brush set is made of high-quality stainless steel which is not easy to rust and deform!

5.[Reassured After-Sales Service] Our broom and dustpan have passed US 21 Security projects testing,if broom set breaks or it's damaged in shipping, or even if you change your mind, please simply let us know（how to: click on your order--contact seller), we will either replace it or get full refund, your choice!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Is A 2022 Improved Designed Broom And Dustpan Set With A More Flexible Lid That Can Be Sealed The Dustpan , The Broom'S Bristles Is Increased From Three Rows To Four Rows,No Longer Leak Dust And Save Your Sweeping Time!.Will you be troubled by tiny dust and little paper that is not obedient and does not into the pan ?.Do you feel sad because of the broom’s bristles ?.Does the height of the broom make you feel depressed?.When the broom is dirty or full of hair, and you don’t want to clean it by hands,What should you do?Our Broom And Dustpan can solve all your troubles ：.The dustpan of the broom and dustpan has a rubber lip that completely fit the ground and can easily capture tiny dust and little paper into the pan..The broom of the broom and dustpan has flagged bristles resulting in a larger surface area and a soft ,but it does not up warp.The long handle of the broom and dustpan allows you to Stands upright for comfortable sweeping..The teeth of the dustpan so that you can get rid of dirty on the broom without using your hands.

The material of the dustpan is so strong that there is no problem for children to stand on it!You won’t have to buy any dustpan and broom for the next few years! An extension rod has been added to the poles of the broom and dustpan, so you no longer have to bend over to sweeping! The bristles of the broom are very thick, which can sweep away dust at one time and reduce your workload!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic dust pan and broom
reviews.reviewText: This is the best one I’ve had. My others had a rubber material lip on it. It was so difficult to get the dust , litter and fur in the bin. But this one does not have a rubber lip. It is the solid material that the bin is made of. Which makes it so easy to sweep the material in the bin. Just put my foot up against the back of the bin, sweep and it’s in. I’m tall and the handle is nice and long. You can attach the broom and dustpan handle to each other and either stand them together with the bin flat on the floor or easily fold the bin up and stand it that way. The broom is made of a great material so it picks up all the dust bunnies and litter with ease. And the comb on the dustbin for those dust bunnies works perfectly the first time. The handles are made of a sturdy material and so easy to put together. Just a great quality item and company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My name is Divine and I got this broom and dust pan set about a month ago. I live alone with my cat and she’s always shedding so those teeth on the dust pan really make a difference. It removes all that build up on the broom. I also really like that the height can be adjusted I think it’s really simple. You just put the poles together for the desired height and start cleaning! Storage is really straightforward as well. The dustpan has a little clip that you put the broom on and then the whole thing just folds up. I’d definitely recommend this product. It’s affordable, good quality, and reliable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars As I suspected
reviews.reviewText: Three CONS but I'd already suspected it may have them when I bought the product so I'm fine with it. Also please keep in mind that the competitors are apt to have the same problems for the same reason.1. The entire unit does not easily close up without having to use your hands. It's do-able but takes a midge of time and effort. I'm lazy so am just keeping it open. The pan does go into the vertical position well enough but the lid takes a bit of work to get in place. Maybe the lid would work better if it was made out of metal (stiffer and heavier) than out of plastic.2. The bristles on the outside of the broom do not stay neatly in the pan when stored in the vertical position. They end up squished like a hairdo badly in need of a bcombing. Again, I'm simply keeping the pan open. The bristles get pushed out of place by the sides of the pan. I suspect that eventually this will mess up the broom bristles themselves. the pan needs to be a midge wider in relation to the width of the broom bristles in order for this not to happen. Only time will tell.3. The bristles of the broom are VERY soft and pliable. I'm used to and prefer a stiffer non-plastic type of broom (with the fuzzy edges that trap the dust bunnies). This means that I have to adjust my stroke style from the one I've been using for years. Too much pressure down on the broom flings the dirt when I let go. I need to do shorter, gentler strokes when using this broom. Too much pressure down on the broom also spreads the hairs apart so that smaller pieces of dirt is missed. See the PROS for having such soft bristles though. An option for a stiffer bristled broom would have been welcome.Here are the PROS about the product.1. It is light.2. It is very easy to put together.3. It has a tall handle both on the pan and the broom. (This is the main reason I bought this unit.)4. The broom handle easily clicks in place for storage to the pan handle.5. The PRO part to having the flimsy hairs on the broom is that it works great with the "comb" to get dust bunnies off of the broom. No more pulling that stuff off by hand.6. It seems sturdy enough. I've not put it through it's paces for a time yet so don't know for sure.7. Nice clean simple look without a bunch of different colors, pictures, logos, etc.8. Nice deep pan but easy to dump out.9. For those of you who don't have the vertical space to store such a tall item, the poles do come apart.Synopsis:I did get this particular model instead of other models due to the lid. Don't bother. The lid does not close at all well. BUT getting this model for the tall poles, deep pan, and the "comb" that you can get the dust bunnies off with is well worth it. The broom bristles themselves are way too flimsy for me but that's a matter of preference. The stiffer bristles that I prefer would not do as well with the "comb". As for how well it catches the dirt as I sweep, I think I just need to adjust my sweeping style to less pressure and smaller strokes. You need to decide which is more important to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will buy again!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this broom & dustpan set!! Dustpan folds up for easy storage!! The dirt actually goes in the dustpan instead of under it!! I've had this set for 9 months and it's still working well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice design, but soft
reviews.reviewText: The design is ideal, but the dustpan is a bit flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Assembly is of course simple. The broom itself is very lightweight and almost cheap feeling, so I do feel like $20 is a bit much for this product, but it works better than a more expensive broom I purchased previous to this one. All in all I’m very happy with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the store brooms
reviews.reviewText: I really love this broom! It is sturdy and made very well. The dustpan is a good size and can hold a lot of trash. The broom is made very well- it is flexible and strong and not overly stiff or anything. I love the attachment where you can clean the broom off on the dust pan as well as the attachment where you can clip both broom and dust pan together when finished using. Very convenient, saves space, gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy with my broom and dustpan set (got it in black)! I have linoleum wood throughout the main parts of my house and use a compact vacuum when needed. However, this little thing is so light and easy to use for those quick cleaning to save time! I love that it has the bristle combs for hair buildup, but my favorite part is that it’s stands upright (very sturdy so it does not fall easily). It perfectly slides between my W/D out of sight and upright. It’s light, sturdy, compact, and gets the job done. Buy it!
Loved it. Contents did not fall on ground but rather stayed in in basket and fell in garbage can.

reviews.reviewerName: Maria Fernanda Silvestre OcañaMaria Fernanda Silvestre Ocaña
reviews.reviewTitle: Wow! Diseño funcional y buena calidad!
reviews.reviewText: Llego antes de tiempo y bien empacado.El diseño y que sea armable es súper práctico, ocupa poco espacio y la escoba permite limpiar bien en todos lados...
EL producto es de muy buena calidad, es ajustable y se adapta a la fisionomía de las personas, resultando muy practico y ergonomico. 100% recomendable.

I am greatly pleased with this product. The broom and dustpan snap together making it very easy to assemble and to store away. It is lightweight but very sturdy and I love the standing dustpan feature. The handle extends, the bristles are durable and it’s aesthetically pleasing too. Definitely would recommend!
The media could not be loaded. I ordered black but u delivered blue and very week quality
